charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived at the coast
in search of a Trainer to battle.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1101_0200_20:
And there [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] found Flint, with his Infernape,
standing perfectly still.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_0400_10:
Sorry, I just had a blazing-hot battle that nearly
burnt me down to cinders.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_0500_10: But I’m all right now! I just got my strength back.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_0600_10:
You’ve got something hot with you, don’t you.
I can feel the heat from here!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0401_0800_10: You know I can see right through you, right?
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_1000_10: You know I can see right through you, right?
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1100_10:
Passionate Trainers are always particular
about something.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1200_10: How about you? What’s your secret to success?
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0401_1400_10:
I knew it! I can feel your red-hot passion
pouring out of you!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_1600_10:
I knew it! I can feel your red-hot passion
pouring out of you!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1700_10: For me, it’s my blazing hairdo!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1800_10:
Some people think if you’re in the Elite Four,
you need to be more clean-cut.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1900_10:
But do they know how much work I put into this
hair? And anyway, it’s your heart that matters,
not your appearance!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_2400_10:
What am I saying? It must be a
compliment! Thanks!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2500_10:
Infernape has some things he’s very particular
about, too.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2600_10:
He always wants to battle against Pokémon that
use moves that are a bad type matchup for him!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2700_10:
He’s been this way ever since he
was a Chimchar.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2800_10:
At first I thought he just wasn’t paying attention,
but then I realized what was going on.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2900_10:
This dude’s got flames in his eyes! All he’s
thinking about is how he wants to get stronger!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3000_10:
Having him as my partner hasn’t been easy,
let me tell you. He’s nearly turned my hair
to ash many, many times.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3100_10:
People have tried to warn me about him, but I
chose to keep on believing in him. We’ve had
a fiery-hot life together!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3200_10:
Don’t get me wrong, though. I’m not saying you
should ignore everybody’s advice.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0401_3400_10:
Always hear what people have to say, 
but if you still decide you’re right, 
you don’t have to change!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_3600_10:
Always hear what people have to say, 
but if you still decide you’re right, 
you don’t have to change!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3700_10:
If you do it that way, then when you fail,
you own that failure—but at least you did it
your way, right?
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3800_10: Staying true to ourselves is our way of battling!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0301_3900_10: What a great combination you are!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0401_4000_10:
Heh! Hearing that from you makes the fire in my
heart burn even brighter!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_4200_10:
Heh! Hearing that from you makes the fire in my
heart burn even brighter!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_4300_10:
I haven’t had a conversation like this with
anybody since Volkner! I like you even
more now!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_4400_10:
Let’s have a blazing-hot battle sometime to see
whose way of doing things comes out on top!
